XML views

Business logic can easily sneak into JavaScript-based views

XML views

views are declarative and easy to quickly decipher

JS View Example


sap.ui.jsview("sample.View1", {

    getControllerName : function() {
        return "sample.View1";
    },

    createContent : function(oController) {
        var aControls = [];
        var oButton = new sap.ui.commons.Button({
          id : this.createId("myButton"),
          text : "Click me!"
        });
        aControls.push(oButton);
        return aControls;
    }
});

XML View Example


<mvc:View
  xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
  controllerName="sample.View1"
  xmlns="sap.m">
  <Button id="myButton" text="Click me!" />
</mvc:View>
